summary: This document appears to be an email exchange from May 28, 2020, where an individual is asked to provide the current addresses of their ex-wife and children, as well as their own residence. The sender indicates they are currently at one location but will be traveling upstate that evening.

persons.name: Unknown
persons.context: The individual who is asked to provide addresses for their ex-wife, children, and themselves. They mention their children are at one location, they are currently at another, and will be traveling upstate.

events.title: Email exchange regarding addresses
events.description: An email is sent requesting the current addresses of an individual's ex-wife, children, and the individual themselves. The individual responds with their travel plans.

keyFacts: The document is an email exchange dated May 28, 2020.
It involves a request for the current addresses of an individual's ex-wife and children, as well as the individual's own residence.
The individual indicates they are at one location but will be traveling upstate that evening.
